sentences.sentence: In an effort to educate entrepreneurs, Kitch debunks these 11 myths.
sentences.translation: 为了试图教育这些企业主，Kitch揭露了这11条迷信。

sentences.sentence: Kitch says many people believe they have to outsource to web designers to build their site.
sentences.translation: Kitch说，许多人相信他们必须将网站的搭建工作外包给网页设计师。

sentences.sentence: In addition, Kitch points to the fact that you can't track Yellow Pages advertising the way you can online advertising.
sentences.translation: 此外，Kitch还指出，你无法像在线广告那样跟踪你在黄页上投放的广告所产生的实际效果。
